00010 ToasterObjectReader::ToasterObjectReader(ros::NodeHandle& node) {
00011     std::cout << "[area_manager] Initializing ToasterObjectReader" << std::endl;
00012 
00013     // Starts listening to the topic
00014     sub_ = node.subscribe("/pdg/objectList", 1, &ToasterObjectReader::objectStateCallBack, this);
00015 }
00016 
00017 void ToasterObjectReader::objectStateCallBack(const toaster_msgs::ObjectList::ConstPtr& msg) {
00018     //std::cout << "[area_manager][DEBUG] new data for object received" << std::endl;
00019 
00020     Object* curObject;
00021     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < msg->objectList.size(); i++) {
00022 
00023         // If this human is not assigned we have to allocate data.
00024         if (lastConfig_.find(msg->objectList[i].meEntity.id) == lastConfig_.end()) {
00025             curObject = new Object(msg->objectList[i].meEntity.id);
00026             curObject->setRoomId(0);
00027             curObject->setName(msg->objectList[i].meEntity.name);
00028         } else
00029             curObject = lastConfig_[msg->objectList[i].meEntity.id];
00030 
00031         std::vector<double> objOrientation;
00032         bg::model::point<double, 3, bg::cs::cartesian> objPosition;
00033 
00034         curObject->setId(msg->objectList[i].meEntity.id);
00035 
00036         curObject->setTime(msg->objectList[i].meEntity.time);
00037 
00038         objPosition.set<0>(msg->objectList[i].meEntity.positionX);
00039         objPosition.set<1>(msg->objectList[i].meEntity.positionY);
00040         objPosition.set<2>(msg->objectList[i].meEntity.positionZ);
00041         curObject->setPosition(objPosition);
00042 
00043         objOrientation.push_back(msg->objectList[i].meEntity.orientationRoll);
00044         objOrientation.push_back(msg->objectList[i].meEntity.orientationPitch);
00045         objOrientation.push_back(msg->objectList[i].meEntity.orientationYaw);
00046         curObject->setOrientation(objOrientation);
00047 
00048         if (lastConfig_[msg->objectList[i].meEntity.id] == NULL)
00049             lastConfig_[curObject->getId()] = curObject;
00050     }
00051 }
00052 
00053 bool ToasterObjectReader::isPresent(unsigned int id) {
00054     timeval curTime;
00055     gettimeofday(&curTime, NULL);
00056     unsigned long now = curTime.tv_sec * pow(10, 9) + curTime.tv_usec;
00057     unsigned long timeThreshold = pow(10, 9);
00058     //std::cout << "current time: " << now <<  "  human time: " << m_LastTime << std::endl;
00059     long timeDif = lastConfig_[id]->getTime() - now;
00060     //std::cout << "time dif: " << timeDif << std::endl;
00061 
00062     if (fabs(timeDif) < timeThreshold)
00063         return true;
00064     else
00065         return false;
00066 }
